Southbound B67 stop on Flatbush Ave at State St is closed
Buses will stop on Flatbush Ave and Atlantic Ave at the B41 stop.

What's happening?
Building construction at 80 Flatbush Avenue

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area.

Summary: B70 buses are detoured in both directions from 39th St between 1st Ave and 3rd Ave
Description:
B70 buses are detoured in both directions from 39th St between 1st Ave and 3rd Ave
Buses start and end their trips at a temporary location on 2nd Ave at 37th St. (see map)

Northbound missed stops:
3rd Ave at 39th St
39th St at 2nd Ave and 1st Ave

Southbound missed stops:
39th St from 1st Ave to 3rd Ave

What's happening?
NYC DEP Sewer Replacement

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area.

For southbound service, use the stops on Vanderbilt Ave at St Marks Ave or Plaza St East.

Summary: B35 stops on 39th St at 1st Ave in both directions and eastbound stops on 39th St at 2nd Ave and 3rd Ave are closed
Description:
B35 stops on 39th St at 1st Ave in both directions and eastbound stops on 39th St at 2nd Ave and 3rd Ave are closed
Buses start and end their trips at a temporary location on 2nd Ave at 37th St and make an eastbound stop on 37th St and 4th Ave at the existing B70 bus stop.
(See map)

What's happening?

Please allow additional travel time.

Summary: B7 stops on Kings Highway at E 40th St are permanently closed in both directions

For westbound service, use the stops on Kings Highway at Avenue K or Ryder St.

Summary: M2 stops on W 165th St at Amsterdam Ave and all stops along Edgecombe Ave are closed in both directions
Description:
M2 stops on W 165th St at Amsterdam Ave and all stops along Edgecombe Ave are closed in both directions
For northbound service, use the stops on Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd at W 153rd St or W 168th St at Audubon Ave.

For southbound service, use the stops on W 166th St at St Nicholas Ave or W 155th St at Edgecombe Ave.

Buses also make requested stops along Amsterdam Ave at M101 stops between W 155th St and W 165th St in both directions.

See a map of the detour.

What's happening?
Paving

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area

Summary: Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Description:
Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Queens Bus Network Redesign service improvements will be phased in by route on June 29 and August 31, 2025.

Until then, know that your bus route will still serve current stops, but some signs will reflect future service.

Use the MTA app or BusTime to plan your trip.

Learn more about the project at mta.info/queensbus
